page.title: 08MY DAY (near GILLING WEST)
page.content: I wake up about 6.30. I get up and look out towards the{cows}to see if they are all there. I go downstairs with my dad and get on my boots and boilersuit and go out. Firstly my dad feeds our pet lambs and I feed our {farm cat}Muffin with{milk.}Then I go to the mealhouse to help dad get food for the{bullocks}and{heifers.}I turn the{heifers troughs}over, then, as my dad puts the{meal}in the troughs, I run over the{heifers}half of the field and test the {electric fence.} My dad puts some{stud cubes}into a bucket for our{horses.} We go in and feed them. Then we park the pickup. We look round the{cows}then the{sheep.}As we walk to the house Dad gives the{pet lambs}some {hay} then we go in and take our boilersuits off.
